verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> ye the LORD. <WH3050> Praise <WH1984> God <WH410> in his sanctuary: <WH6944> praise <WH1984> him in the firmament <WH7549> of his power. <WH5797>
Praise <WH1984> him for his mighty acts: <WH1369> praise <WH1984> him according to his excellent <WH7230> greatness. <WH1433>
Praise <WH1984> him with the sound <WH8629> of the trumpet: <WH7782> praise <WH1984> him with the psaltery <WH5035> and harp. <WH3658>
Praise <WH1984> him with the timbrel <WH8596> and dance: <WH4234> praise <WH1984> him with stringed instruments <WH4482> and organs. <WH5748>
Praise <WH1984> him upon the loud <WH8088> cymbals: <WH6767> praise <WH1984> him upon the high sounding <WH8643> cymbals. <WH6767>
Let every <WH3605> thing that hath breath <WH5397> praise <WH1984> the LORD. <WH3050> Praise <WH1984> ye the LORD. <WH3050>
